## Column {.tabset}

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
d2=read.csv(file.choose())
head(d2) 
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(plotly)
summary(d2)
str(d2)
```
### Chart1

```{r}
plot(d2$lot_size)
```

### Chart2

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
barplot(d2$bathrooms)
```


### Chart3

```{r}
hist(d2$price, col="pink")
```
